      • afterRecordSerialize

        void afterRecordSerialize(int offset,
                          short recordId,
                          int size,
                          EscherRecord record)
        Fired after a record has been serialized.(${t_5f2af08ba893402aabc9bffb5aa18c1d})
        Parameters:
        offset - The position of the end of the serialized record + 1(${t_8c5cc42aa4ce4c378ec567e43dbfd80b})
        recordId - The id of the record about to be serialized(${t_bb73a80c0ce84abcaf1c759a22150695})
        size - The number of bytes written for this record. If it is a container record then this will include the size of any included records.(${t_5a4a000c780f4e64a6216dc62b1ae86f})
        record - The record which was serialized(${t_cae931ca101d4f8ab203d843e2810482})
